questions.question: What is the correct form? 'If we _____ now, we will catch the train.'
Which sentence is a correct example of the first conditional?
options: If it rains, we will stay indoors.
If it rained, we would stay indoors.
If it had rained, we would have stayed indoors.
If it rains, we stayed indoors.
questions.answer: If it rains, we will stay indoors.
